questions.title: MOSFET Corner Case Test
questions.question_text: Calculate the voltage across the resistor. The voltage is 0.5,text{V} and the current has gamma dependence.
questions.feedback_correct: The gamma parameter and phi_F are critical in MOSFET analysis.
questions.feedback_incorrect: Remember that gamma and phi_F have specific LaTeX formatting requirements.

questions.title: Greek Letter Test
questions.question_text: What is the value of gamma when phi_F = 0.7 V?
questions.feedback_correct: gamma and phi_F must be properly formatted as LaTeX.
questions.feedback_incorrect: Check your gamma and phi_F calculations.
